en.MOUSE_POSITION_NODES_PLUGIN_DESCRIPTION: Contains several nodes to get the position of mouse.
en.MOUSE_POSITION_RELATIVE_TO_WARUDO_CORNER: Mouse Position Relative To Warudo Corner
en.MOUSE_POSITION_RELATIVE_TO_WARUDO_CENTER: Mouse Position Relative To Warudo Center

zh_CN.MOUSE_POSITION_NODES_PLUGIN_DESCRIPTION: 包含多个节点用于获取鼠标位置。

zh_CN.MOUSE_POSITION_RELATIVE_TO_WARUDO_CENTER: 鼠标相对 Warudo 中心位置
